hints.content:
To find how many $\text{mL}$ of grape juice Al started with, we start with the $\blue{96} \text { mL}$ he has now and subtract the $\pink{60} \text { mL}$ his friend gave him.

$\blue{96}-\pink{60} = \green{\Box}$
Al E. Gator had $\green{36} \text { mL}$ of grape juice before his friend gave him more.

question.content:
Al E. Gator had some grape juice in his cup.  His friend, Croc A. Dile gave him $60 \text { mL}$ more grape juice.  Now Al E. Gator has $96 \text { mL}$ of grape juice.

**How many mL of grape juice did Al E. Gator have before his friend gave him more?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] mL
